languages.text: {n}Точное устройство механического замка вам неизвестно, однако это не мешает вывести его из строя. Дверь клетки со скрипом приоткрывается, однако зверь внутри никак на это не реагирует.{/n}
{n}You are unfamiliar with the operation of the mechanical lock, but that does not stop you from disabling it. The cage door opens with a creak; however, the beast inside shows no reaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Точное устройство механического замка вам неизвестно, однако это не мешает вывести его из строя. Дверь клетки со скрипом приоткрывается, однако зверь внутри никак на это не реагирует.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You are unfamiliar with the operation of the mechanical lock, but that does not stop you from disabling it. The cage door opens with a creak, but the beast inside shows no reaction.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管你并不熟悉机械锁的构造，但你轻而易举地撬开了锁。笼门“咯吱”一声打开了，但笼子里的异虎依然没有任何反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are unfamiliar with the operation of the mechanical lock, but that does not stop you from disabling it. The cage door opens with a creak; however, the beast inside shows no reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管你并不熟悉机械锁的构造，但你轻而易举地撬开了锁。笼门“咯吱”一声打开了，但笼子里的异虎依然没有任何反应。{/n}

languages.text: {n}No conoces el funcionamiento de la cerradura mecánica, pero eso no te impide inutilizarla. La jaula se abre con un chirrido, pero la bestia del interior no muestra reacción alguna.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are unfamiliar with the operation of the mechanical lock, but that does not stop you from disabling it. The cage door opens with a creak; however, the beast inside shows no reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No conoces el funcionamiento de la cerradura mecánica, pero eso no te impide inutilizarla. La jaula se abre con un chirrido, pero la bestia del interior no muestra reacción alguna.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mekanik kilidin çalışma prensibine aşina olmasan da kilidi devre dışı bırakmayı başarıyorsun. Kafesin kapısı, gıcırtı eşliğinde açılıyor. İçerideki hayvan ise hiç tepki vermiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are unfamiliar with the operation of the mechanical lock, but that does not stop you from disabling it. The cage door opens with a creak; however, the beast inside shows no reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mekanik kilidin çalışma prensibine aşina olmasan da kilidi devre dışı bırakmayı başarıyorsun. Kafesin kapısı, gıcırtı eşliğinde açılıyor. İçerideki hayvan ise hiç tepki vermiyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}機械式の錠前の操作には不慣れだが、それでも解除することができた。ケージの扉が軋みを上げて開く―しかし、内側にいるそのラセラックスは何の反応も示さなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are unfamiliar with the operation of the mechanical lock, but that does not stop you from disabling it. The cage door opens with a creak; however, the beast inside shows no reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}機械式の錠前の操作には不慣れだが、それでも解除することができた。ケージの扉が軋みを上げて開く―しかし、内側にいるそのラセラックスは何の反応も示さなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le fonctionnement de ce verrou mécanique vous est inconnu, mais vous parvenez malgré tout à le désactiver. La porte de la cage s'ouvre en grinçant, mais la créature à l'intérieur n'esquisse pas le moindre mouvement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are unfamiliar with the operation of the mechanical lock, but that does not stop you from disabling it. The cage door opens with a creak; however, the beast inside shows no reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le fonctionnement de ce verrou mécanique vous est inconnu, mais vous parvenez malgré tout à le désactiver. La porte de la cage s'ouvre en grinçant, mais la créature à l'intérieur n'esquisse pas le moindre mouvement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bist mit der Funktionsweise des mechanischen Schlosses nicht vertraut, kannst es aber trotzdem deaktivieren. Die Tür des Käfigs öffnet sich mit einem Quietschen, aber die Bestie darin zeigt keinerlei Reaktion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are unfamiliar with the operation of the mechanical lock, but that does not stop you from disabling it. The cage door opens with a creak; however, the beast inside shows no reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bist mit der Funktionsweise des mechanischen Schlosses nicht vertraut, kannst es aber trotzdem deaktivieren. Die Tür des Käfigs öffnet sich mit einem Quietschen, aber die Bestie darin zeigt keinerlei Reaktion.{/n}
